Text: Just the same screener file thats been out for over a month or so, only difference he's cropped the shit out of it. Not HD TYKOON as HD doesn't pixelate m8!
good copy if ya ask me just bout dvd quality

THANKS A LOT FOR D.L.!!! Awesome movie (Spielberg effects w J.J. Abrams story) 10/10!!!
A/9. V/9. Excellent for me! This was definitely one of the finest HD-DVD Rips I've seen (and I've seen close to 50). I completely forgot this WASN'T the real thing. I played it again to give an unbiased rating, and forgot - again, but did notice what I consider inconsequential imperfections. For example, blending of very dark hues (like the silhouettes of shrubs at night) might show sections that were slightly less-than-black. Also, some parts seemed to switch between HD and DVD quality. Overall the video was EXCELLENT to me, for a HD-DVD Rip. 
I only mentioned this because there are only 2 comments, one being critical. 
TO CRITICS: Before you dis an HD Rip, check that your monitor/screen is calibrated for optimal performance, read up on what doing it yourself would involve (I did), and try to do it yourself so your criticism, if you think it's necessary, is CONSTRUCTIVE!!! Most of these ppl put in a lot of effort, sometimes explaining exactly what they did on the download page, hoping others will help them improve.
I'm seeding and others are too so download this torrent, and thank the peeps who make this possible for the rest of us. Thanks for reading, and enjoy this torrent!
